doc.name: SecretKeyReader
doc.description:
Open a keystore from a FileParameter and output a SecretKey.

This class is a wrapper class for ptolemy.actor.lib.security.KeyReader that always returns a secret key.

The secret key is a symmetric key can be used by the ptolemy.actor.lib.security.SymmetricEncryption and ptolemy.actor.lib.security.SymmetricDecryption actors. See ptolemy.actor.lib.security.SymmetricEncryption for a description of symmetric vs. asymmetric algorithms.
doc.author: Christopher Hylands Brooks
